name: market for landed hake, fresh | landed hake, fresh | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18733/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'landed hake, fresh', in the Global geography.;This dataset represents the transport of 1 kg of landed hake from the harbor or port that is landed till the place where it is later sold for commercial or private consumption. No losses are considered in this dataset.;The product 'landed hake, fresh' is a wild-caught fish landed whole at the port.

The activity starts with the reception of landed hake.

The activity ends with the provision of hake for commercial or private consumption.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data are intended to reflect current equipment and processes on a Global level.
